title: League forced a repair right as a game started
body: so i was in champ select and everything was normal but then as soon at the timer runs out, i get kicked out and it said league is repairing something by the time it finished the game was remade and i got an unfair 20 min afk queue because of a stupid force repair and i cant even access league support to make a ticket

This just happened to me right now. What ended up happening for you? I have been waiting for half an hour of this new client "repairing" itself.

Sorry that this happened and resulted in a remake, but the patcher was just trying to recover your game.  The repair is only forced if your game files have become corrupt to the point of no access, so it wouldn't have been possible to play without it.  Hopefully those game files are repaired now, and you're able to get back in the game.  Just in case, though, test it in a custom game before starting another.
